live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 10:30 AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
36944.summary: Some customers in the Acadia area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36944.title: Apr 29 – Calgary (Acadia) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Services for most customers are back online, but they may continue to be intermittent.  Tech crews are working to permanently restore service.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
36938.summary: Some customers in the Metchosin area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36938.title: Apr 28 – Victoria (Metchosin) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
